message: Hey fellow players! P6 here, excited for a clean, strategic game. I’m looking for conversation partners who value reasoned cooperation over random backstabs—let’s share info, read the field together, and help each other survive the early rounds. I’m open, pragmatic, and ready to listen more than speak. If that sounds useful to your strategy, rank me high and let’s chat privately. Good luck to everyone, and let the games begin!

I’m a good listener and open to different perspectives, so if you’re looking for a reliable partner, rank me high for a chat. Let’s navigate this together and make smart moves. Good luck to all!
